title: blu Ionic Shower Head and Shower Filter - Handheld - Removes Chlorine & Harmful Pollutants - Prevent Hair Loss & Moisturize Your Skin, Chrome
raw_desc: ✔ IMMEDIATELY REJUVENATE YOUR HAIR & SKIN: Suffering from dry itchy skin, flaky dandruff, eczema, bone-dry hair, and hair loss caused by chlorinated & chemical-ridden water? Our UNIQUE, PROPRIETARY, TESTED, and SGS & EUROFINS CERTIFIED MULTI-STAGE filters deliver MAXIMUM WATER FILTRATION to REMOVE HARMFUL WATER POLLUTANTS, NEUTRALIZE ODORS and REVITALIZE your hair and skin from the first time you turn it on! ✔ ACTUALLY WORKS - Our TOP-SELLING & TOP-RATED shower filters are now even better with ADVANCED, MULTI-STAGE HEALTH PROMOTING FILTERS reducing chlorine, pesticides, pharmaceuticals, dirt, odors, reversing the damage that your hard, chemical-filled water did to your hair, skin, and nails! YOUR SKIN WILL GO FROM ITCHY TO SOOTHED & YOUR HAIR WILL BECOME THICK & SILKY SOFT. ✔ LESS THAN AED 1 PER DAY: WHAT is your HEALTH worth? What about LOOKING YOUR BEST & having naturally silky soft & thick hair? blu Ionic Shower Filters have helped hundreds of thousands of satisfied customers LOVE THEIR SKIN AGAIN, MINIMIZE THEIR HAIR LOSS and live their best life through a CLEANER CLEARER, BEAUTIFYING SHOWER TIME for LESS than AED 1 per day. ✔ EASY INSTALLATION: No need for a plumber and no tools required. Fits any standard shower hose and can be EASILY INSTALLED IN MINUTES! Replace the filter cartridge every 70 – 100 showers to continue receiving the full benefits of the filtration. ✔ BLU INTELLIGENT HEALTH SOLUTIONS produces the world's leading blu Ionic Shower Filters with a 2-year warranty. Our customer service team is always ready to take care of your needs if you have any questions or other concerns. Satisfied and happy customers are our highest priority.
features: ✔ IMMEDIATELY REJUVENATE YOUR HAIR & SKIN: Suffering from dry itchy skin, flaky dandruff, eczema, bone-dry hair, and hair loss caused by chlorinated & chemical-ridden water? Our UNIQUE, PROPRIETARY, TESTED, and SGS & EUROFINS CERTIFIED MULTI-STAGE filters deliver MAXIMUM WATER FILTRATION to REMOVE HARMFUL WATER POLLUTANTS, NEUTRALIZE ODORS and REVITALIZE your hair and skin from the first time you turn it on!

✔ LESS THAN AED 1 PER DAY: WHAT is your HEALTH worth?
